com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigAvailableDeviceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigAvailableDeviceData

  • public class RigAvailableDeviceData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides data storage for available Bluetooth devices.

      • RigAvailableDeviceData

        public RigAvailableDeviceData(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice bluetoothDevice,
                              int rssi,
                              byte[] scanRecord,
                              long discoverTime)
        Available device data object constructor.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothDevice - The available Bluetooth device
        rssi - The RSSI of the device's advertisement
        scanRecord - The advertising data record
        discoverTime - The system time of the discovery

    • Method Detail

      • getRssi

        public int getRssi()
        Returns:
        Returns the RSSI of the discovery.

      • getDiscoverTime

        public long getDiscoverTime()
        Returns:
        Returns the system time of the discovery

      • getScanRecord

        public byte[] getScanRecord()
        Returns:
        Returns the advertising data record

      • getBluetoothDevice

        public android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice getBluetoothDevice()
        Returns:
        Returns the low level Bluetooth device object for this discovery

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares two available device data objects for equality. They are equal if their Bluetooth MAC addresses match.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - The object for comparison
        Returns:
        Returns true if equal; false otherwise

        Converts the available device data object to a string.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        Returns the Bluetooth MAC address as a string
